 2015-09212015-06-18,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of JENNIFER REYNOLDS of Toronto, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Development Investment Corporation to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of John Hillyard, effective July 1, 2015.
AttachmentsAttachment
